distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for uriparser fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-34402: Fixed integer overflow protection in ComposeQueryEngine (bsc#1223887).
- CVE-2024-34403: Fixed integer overflow protection in ComposeQueryMallocExMm (bsc#1223888).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An issue was discovered in uriparser through 0.9.7. ComposeQueryEngine in UriQuery.c has an integer overflow via long keys or values, with a resultant buffer overflow.
notes.title: CVE description
